mapper.select: select * from users u where u.aid in (select fid from FRIENDS where aid=#{aid} and fid in(select aid from FRIENDS where fid=#{aid}))
select * from users u where u.uid in (select aid from FRIENDS f where f.fid=#{aid} and aid not in (select fid from FRIENDS f where f.aid=#{aid}))
select * from users u where u.uid not in (select f.fid from friends f where f.aid=#{aid}) and u.uid!=#{aid} and u.address like '%'||(select u.address from users u where u.uid=#{aid})||'%'
select count(aid) from FRIENDS f where f.fid=#{aid} and aid not in (select fid from FRIENDS f where f.aid=#{aid})

SELECT TB.aid,TB.C,u.nickname,u.picture FROM (SELECT A.aid aid,COUNT(aid) c FROM (SELECT aid FROM FRIENDS WHERE FID IN (SELECT FID FROM FRIENDS WHERE AID = #{aid} AND FID IN (SELECT AID FROM FRIENDS WHERE FID = #{aid})) AND AID IN (SELECT FID FROM FRIENDS WHERE AID IN (SELECT FID FROM FRIENDS WHERE AID = #{aid} AND FID IN (SELECT AID FROM FRIENDS WHERE FID = #{aid}))) AND AID != #{aid} AND AID NOT IN (SELECT FID FROM FRIENDS WHERE AID = #{aid} AND FID IN (SELECT AID FROM FRIENDS WHERE FID = #{aid}))) A GROUP BY aid) TB,USERS u WHERE TB.aid=u.aid
